extendedInfo.description: Application get video from camera and set as wallpaper. If you want special video effects please download full version.

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: Crashes camera app and lock screen camera until I change my wallpaper other than that I love it!
reviews.author: Joshua Thompson

reviews.title: Pointless
reviews.comment: Just displays video as wallpaper. Not \"transparent\" by any means. Quickest uninstall I\'ve ever done.
reviews.author: Todd Copeland

reviews.title: Omg ..
reviews.comment: This App Is Amazing ! Great Quality, Looks Transparent && The Cam Almost Never Drags ! If Anything 2x In Like A Week ... Sucks For Anyone Else Cause This App Is Perfect!
reviews.author: Kathy Esparza

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: No good it won\'t work on adroid tablet just makes screen go black I wouldn\'t recomened it to anyone
reviews.author: Sophia Sophia

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: It works fine on my s2, its just that it crashes my camera and i can\'t open it up unless I change the wallpaper and then reboot. Should also include front camera! Buggy, but it should improve!
reviews.author: Arthur Green

reviews.title: Cool Wallpaper, Lacks Features, Full Version Missing on Play Store
reviews.comment: Very cool live wall paper, but the full version doesn\'t show up on google play. If the full version were to show up, be reasonably priced, and included snapshot/record, transparency, and camera select, would absolutely be five stars.
reviews.author: Adam Smetana

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: All I\'ve got is a black screen >_<
reviews.author: ANAS MT

reviews.title: Two stars for awesome concept, but...
reviews.comment: I can\'t seem to figure out how to turn it on. No way to directly open the app, and can\'t seem to figure out how to trigger it. Widget, please?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This app does what it says without ads.  Sometimes, the camera app fails when you quickly access it from your locked phone, but you can back out and allow the phone to catch up with itself to make it work.
reviews.author: Walter Burchette, III

reviews.title: The concept is awesome
reviews.comment: This app is really great depsite having no settings. My only complaint is when I turn the home screen, the wallpaper goes glitchy or something. Please fix. :)
reviews.author: Chia Jun Jie

reviews.comment: It works but turns into black screen, needs to get fixed, and it drains my battery.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does nothing
reviews.comment: It just show a black wallpaper. Norhing else
reviews.author: Lg Power

reviews.title: Sony Experia Active
reviews.comment: Sucks!!!!! My phone is stuck on the loading screen after rebooting!!! cant get to the menu/settings, cant see anything, just stuck on loading screen, i can hear the software functioning in the background after a minute, but i cant see any operations. This software sucks!!!!!  If there\'s a fix or workaround for this or a way for me to uninstall it, then its brilliant, otherwise thumbs down!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nearly perfect!
reviews.comment: Does just what I wanted!  But face-unlocker can\'t start while this is running.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: thank you
reviews.comment: go to your setting, wallpaper set it to LIVE and you will find it.  yes it will take a lot of juse to run but its kool
reviews.author: valery tozer

reviews.title: Works as stated...
reviews.comment: Ignore the one star comments.... this is a live video feed from your camera as a wallpaper. It works - just select it as a LIVE WALLPAPER... Duh. That\'s why there is no app to open. (note: there was only a black screen when initially selecting as a LW, once I was on my home screen, it worked perfectly.) Also, I resent the comment about \"American Idiots\" made by another Googler... that\'s just hateful.
reviews.author: Thomas Sheeley II

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: The best app EVER I love it its perfect it never drags move with you the whole time never seen it before awesome just awesome
reviews.author: AJ Ramos

reviews.title: Cool concept
reviews.comment: First thing...to all of you complaining about not being able to locate the app, its a wallpaper, not an application! The wallpaper uses your camera to make it seem as though your phone is transparent. Downside, it consumes a lot of battery. Plus, not sure if running your camera 24/7 is good for the phone. However, the wallpaper is free...download it and give it a try.
reviews.author: Brandon Burns

reviews.title: Disables camera
reviews.comment: This wallpaper is beautiful but you cannot open the camera app while its enabled
reviews.author: Paul Hamilton
